name: unrd
slogan: Immersive mobile stories that you read with friends
description:
We’re unrd (pronounced unread!). A VC backed startup re-imagining the future of entertainment.
 
We’ve created a new form of storytelling; real-time entertainment. Using a combination of text messages, social-style video and immersive world building, our stories are played and talked about by people all around the world. Our mission is to create the world's leading, mobile-first entertainment brand.

Apple have described it as the 'most ambitious narrative platform they've seen'.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Shib
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @unrd • Worked as a marketing strategist at @Publicis Groupe, @Isobar @BBH

team.name: Andy White
team.bioHtml:
Fifth developer hire at ASOS, experienced huge gowth.

High scale at itv.com.

First lead dev hire at Just Eat, Experienced IPO, founded R&D team, product owner

jobs.title: Senior Engineer
jobs.description:
Where we’re at…

We’re unrd (pronounced unread!). A VC backed startup re-imagining the future of entertainment.
 
We’ve created a new form of storytelling; real-time entertainment. Using a combination of text messages, social-style video and immersive world building, our stories are played and talked about by people all around the world. Our mission is to create the world's leading, mobile-first entertainment brand.

Apple have described it as the 'most ambitious narrative platform they've seen'.
 
What we expect from a Senior Engineer...

As a Senior Engineer you’re pragmatic, product focused and committed to building systems that will give our users an excellent experience at scale. You are highly efficient, organised but not at the expense of great craft. And of course, you have a love for storytelling and tech. 

You’ll be working in a cross functional team of developers, story writers, designers, movie producers and, reporting into the CTO.

Key responsibilities

Strong AWS - we run primarily on aws you should have strong fundamentals of securing, deploying and running on AWS other cloud provider experience (particularly GCP) is also a bonus
OOAD & SOLID Fundamentals 
Fluent with Git, Gitlab is a bonus.
C# and .Net Core (you should have a deep knowledge of C#, Node.js also of interest)
HTTP & API’s - A deep understanding of HTTP and how to build secure and scalable api’s
Severless - You’ll be creating greenfield systems using AWS lambda so you should have a deep interest in using serverless
CI/Automated tests - we believe in the benefits that CI brings, you should have experience in unit testing and integration testing (BDD, ATDD)
Javascript frameworks - React, Angular
Strong SQL (AWS RDS) and bonus points for NoSQL databases i.e DynamoDB, Firestore
Clear communicator - able to understand specs, document work



Core qualities and attributes

Relationship development - internal and external; positive and able to build trust
Teamwork - create a collaborative and inclusive environment to help each team member to thrive
Commercial awareness - understand the bigger picture for unrd while staying on top of tactical production of stories
Communication - able to engage with all members of the company across disciplines, as well as external contractors, suppliers, or partners
Project management - comfortable managing projects through production to finished result; great at meeting deadlines
Problem solving - excellent problem solving skills and an entrepreneurial and open minded approach to applying them
Prioritisation and flexibility - comfortable with fast-paced environment; able to manage multiple tasks at any given point while adapting to changing priorities


What we offer…

The opportunity to work on a new, award winning format
A relaxed environment to work in - we’re in the middle of East London, Old Street
25 days holidays, plus your birthday off.
….And we finish at 4pm on Friday’s, unless something’s on fire!
